name: Neusoft Group
overview: As of July 10, 2008, Neusoft Group Ltd. was acquired by Neusoft Corporation. Neusoft Group, Ltd. provides software and solutions in China. The company provides IT services and solutions, medical systems and services, and IT education and training. It also develops medical equipment systems, network security products, auto electronics, and mobile communication facilities software, as well as offers digital solutions for hospitals. The companyâ€™s medical equipment systems include CT scanners, MRI and X-ray machines, and ultrasound devices. In addition, it provides software products and middleware, including security, mobile Internet, database, business management, and technology embedded platform products; electric power, e-government, social insurance, tobacco, finance and securities, telecom, education, and taxation solutions; and general security, bluetooth, and anti-counterfeit solutions, as well as medical image management and mobile ward round systems. Further, the company offers BPO, IT service outsourcing, and IT system outsourcing services. It serves customers in China, the United States, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China with branches in China, the United States, Japan, Hungary, and the United Arab Emirates. It operates software parks in Shenyang, Dalian, Nanhai, and Chengdu, China.
